name: Attuned_Fury_of_the_Gladiator_E
display_name: Attuned Fury of the Gladiator E
display_fullname: Boosts.Attuned Fury of the Gladiator E
display_help: Enhances the accuracy of a power by {Boost.Attrib.Accuracy.Scale}%, damage by {Boost.Attrib.Damage.Scale}%, reduces endurance cost by {Boost.Attrib.Endurance.Scale}% and reduces recharge time by {Boost.Attrib.RechargeTime.Scale}%. NOTE: This is a PvP enhancement, this type of enhancement has two groups of set bonuses. You get the set bonuses not marked "(PvP)" while experiencing PvE content, but you get both the PvP set bonuses and the PvE set bonuses when fighting players.
power_short_helps: Enhances Accuracy, Damage, Recharge, and Reduces Endurance Cost
